TopicTitle: [Cinematic] The Kerbal Space Race - Chapter 2: First Steps

Articles.Content:
Hello another time!

First chapter explaining stuff like why I'm doing this:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/63347-Cinematic-The-Kerbal-Space-Race-Chapter-1-The-beginning-of-everything

And now, the 2nd Chapter!

(Btw, that video may contain TYPOS and errors, but I'm spanish and my english level is not perfect. I hope that's not a problem)

Hey, I've already posted this on youtube but I'd like to know where you get that great music from. Especially the piece in the opening bumper: as I'm actually working on a cinematic in which I think there is a scene that would fit with the track quite nicely.
